mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_write(writeno, somoimno, memberno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(writeno), 0) + 1 as writeno FROM s_write), #{somoimno}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, sysdate, #{word})
mapper.select: SELECT writeno, somoimno, memberno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM s_write WHERE somoimno=#{somoimno} ORDER BY writeno DESC
